void.string:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.fiorano.com/fesb/activity/SMTP1/smtp/in" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.fiorano.com/fesb/activity/SMTP1/smtp/in"> <xsd:element name="Email"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="To" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Comma separated sequence of email addresses of the recipient(s)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="From" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CC" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="BCC" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ReplyTo" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="DispositionNotificationTo" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="ReturnReceipt" type="xsd:boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="Subject" type="SubjectType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Headers" type="HeadersType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Attachments" type="AttachmentsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Body" type="Body" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="Body"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TextBody" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="HtmlBody" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="charset" type="xsd:string" default="UTF-8"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AttachmentsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Attachment" type="AttachmentType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AttachmentType" mixed="true"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="name" use="required" type="xsd:string"> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="contentId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:attribute name="readFromFile" default="no"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:NMTOKEN"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="no"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="true"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="false"></xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="base64Encoded" default="no"> <xsd:simpleType> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:NMTOKEN"> <xsd:enumeration value="yes"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="no"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="true"></xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="false"></xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="SubjectType" mixed="true"> <xsd:simpleContent> <xsd:extension base="xsd:string"> <xsd:attribute name="charset" use="optional" type="xsd:string" default="UTF-8"/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:simpleContent> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="HeadersType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Header" type="HeaderType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="HeaderType"> <xsd:attribute name="name" use="required" type="xsd:string"></xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="value" use="required" type="xsd:string"></xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="charset" use="optional" type="xsd:string" default="UTF-8"></xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
